howTo_mean.name: How to calculate the arithmetic mean (average)
howTo_mean.description: Step-by-step example showing how the mean is calculated using Stat Tools' Mean Calculator.

step.name: Enter numbers
step.text: Enter the list of numbers into the Mean Calculator. Non-numeric values will be ignored if the option is set.

step.name: Submit
step.text: Click Calculate to compute the sum and count.

step.name: Review result
step.text: The tool returns the mean, the calculation steps and a textual explanation.

acceptedAnswer.text: The arithmetic mean is the sum of values divided by the number of values.

mainEntity.name: How does Stat Tools handle non-numeric values?

acceptedAnswer.text: By default non-numeric values are ignored when the 'ignore_non_numeric' option is enabled; otherwise an error is shown.
